医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
无创血液检测显示结直肠癌检测灵敏度达 83%，为早期诊断带来希望使用游离脱氧核糖核酸 (DNA) 筛查结直肠癌的血液检测方法的性能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Non-operative-blood-test-shows-8325-sensitivity-in-detecting-colorectal-cancer-offering-hope-for-early-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Non-operative-blood-test-shows-8325-sensitivity-in-detecting-colorectal-cancer-offering-hope-for-early-diagnosis.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=406d0b84-0b67-4a3a-b1e5-ccf47485bea9 Mon, 18 Mar 2024 09:48:00 -0400 Non-invasive blood test shows 83% sensitivity in detecting colorectal cancer, offering hope for early diagnosis

气候变化如何影响媒介传播疾病的传播？气候变化、天气和其他人为因素对媒介传播疾病的影响在全球蔓延。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/How-is-climate-change-influencing-the-spread-of-vector-borne-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/How-is-climate-change-influencing-the-spread-of-vector-borne-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0602c8b2-d4d2-48c1-bc40-f861116cf782 Mon, 18 Mar 2024 07:37:00 -0400 How is climate change influencing the spread of vector-borne diseases?
Immunome 选择将 Arrayjet 的 ArrayPlex 平台用于发现靶向癌症疗法Immunome 签署协议，在其内部筛选操作中使用 Arrayjet 平台。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Arrayjete28099s-ArrayPlex-platform-selected-by-Immunome-for-use-in-its-discovery-of-targeted-cancer-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Arrayjete28099s-ArrayPlex-platform-selected-by-Immunome-for-use-in-its-discovery-of-targeted-cancer-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=849e3e85-4a57-4b1a-ba18-e5ac0cdecbde Mon, 18 Mar 2024 07:08:00 -0400 Arrayjet’s ArrayPlex platform selected by Immunome for use in its discovery of targeted cancer therapies
乳腺癌现在资助研究人员研究脑转移性乳腺癌的靶向放射治疗在 Breast Cancer Now 的新资助下，研究人员正在试验一种新型靶向放射疗法来治疗大脑中的继发性乳腺癌肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Breast-Cancer-Now-funds-researchers-to-investigate-targeted-radiotherapy-for-metastatic-breast-cancer-in-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Breast-Cancer-Now-funds-researchers-to-investigate-targeted-radiotherapy-for-metastatic-breast-cancer-in-the-brain.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=113e5e1c-5630-4539-94c4-c94356e290dc Mon, 18 Mar 2024 06:21:00 -0400 Breast Cancer Now funds researchers to investigate targeted radiotherapy for metastatic breast cancer in the brain
研究显示，神经系统疾病的全球健康负担比以前理解的要大得多在全球范围内，由于全球人口的增长和老龄化以及接触机会的增加，过去 30 年中患有或死于中风、阿尔茨海默病和其他痴呆症以及脑膜炎等神经系统疾病的人数大幅增加环境、代谢和生活方式风险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Global-health-burden-of-neurological-conditions-is-much-greater-than-previously-understood-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Global-health-burden-of-neurological-conditions-is-much-greater-than-previously-understood-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f5e8359-a6b0-41e5-b4e1-4d23f0f65d7d Mon, 18 Mar 2024 06:16:00 -0400 Global health burden of neurological conditions is much greater than previously understood, study reveals
2021-22 年，澳大利亚 53% 的受伤住院病例是由普通家养宠物造成的猫和狗是澳大利亚最常见的家养宠物，2021-22 年与动物接触相关的所有受伤住院治疗中，有一半以上 (53%) 是由猫和狗造成的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Common-domestic-pets-in-Australia-responsible-for-5325-of-injury-hospitalizations-in-2021e2809322.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Common-domestic-pets-in-Australia-responsible-for-5325-of-injury-hospitalizations-in-2021e2809322.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=496e5657-d842-473a-9b15-e1beab1ec180 Mon, 18 Mar 2024 06:09:00 -0400 Common domestic pets in Australia responsible for 53% of injury hospitalizations in 2021–22

痛风不仅是维多利亚人的专利：四分之一的英国人患有这种极其痛苦的疾病​​​​​​​如果您认为痛风是一种过时的疾病，影响肥胖、红脸的维多利亚时代人，那么请再想一想。现在，四分之一的英国人患有这种极其痛苦的疾病，使其成为英国最常见的炎症性关节炎。一位权威专家表示，20 多岁和 30 多岁人群的病例增加了 30%，需要更快的监测和治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Gout-not-just-for-Victorians-1-in-40-Brits-have-this-extremely-painful-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240318/Gout-not-just-for-Victorians-1-in-40-Brits-have-this-extremely-painful-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7b88abf-6934-4dbc-b4fe-7e153ee19d4a Mon, 18 Mar 2024 05:57:00 -0400 Gout not just for Victorians: 1 in 40 Brits have this extremely painful disease
